fields.value: Higher Education General Information Survey (HEGIS) XVII:  Financial Statistics of Institutions of Higher Education for Fiscal Year Ending 1982

authorName.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value: The Higher Education General Information Survey (HEGIS) Series was designed to provide comprehensive information on various aspects of postsecondary education in the United States and its territories (American Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, and the Marshall Islands) and Department of Defense schools outside of the United States. The Financial Statistics Survey is part of the HEGIS XVII package which was distributed to nearly 3,300 institutions of higher education located in the United States and its outlying areas. This study contains final, edited data and includes data for 3,294 institutions, of which 306 have been imputed. Items specify current funds revenues by source, current funds expenditures by function, physical plant assets, indebtedness on physical plants, endowment assets, and changes in fund balances.

topicClassValue.value: IDRC VI. Human Dimension of International Relations

SAS, SPSS, and STATA setup files have been added to the study.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: LRECL with SAS, SPSS, and Stata setup files;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The items in Part G of the survey form require input from publicly controlled institutions. However, these data were not entered into the HEGIS XVII Financial Database, but were used by the Bureau of Census, U.S. Department of Commerce. No data are published or otherwise released containing personally identifiable data on any individual.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Data file(s), and electronic documentation.;
